title: It's Almost Time For March Madness
teaser: Sports analyst Mike Pesca joins us for an early look at the brackets for the college basketball conference tournaments.
contentencoded:
The regular college basketball season is winding down and conference tournaments are beginning. The goal is getting an invitation to the Big Dance, the NCAA Tournament for the men and women. The fields for those tourneys will be unveiled March 15 for men’s teams and March 16 for women’s teams.

The big story in the men’s game this year is Kentucky. The Wildcats are 30-0 going into their final regular season game. Connecticut, Notre Dame and South Carolina are the top women’s teams. Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca joins host Robin Young for an early look at the brackets.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
